DOC.brief_title: Investigating Efficacy Safety Two Degarelix Three-Month Dosing Regimens Patients With Prostate Cancer Requiring Androgen Ablation Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-Label , Multi-Centre , Randomized Parallel-Group Dose-Finding Study , Investigating Efficacy Safety Two Degarelix Three-Month Dosing Regimens Patients Prostrate Cancer Requiring Androgen Ablation Therapy .
